snippet.title: Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures | Teaser Announce Trailer US
snippet.description:
Something spooktacular is coming 🦇. All-new adventures set in the Hotel Transylvania Universe. Stay tuned, Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures arrives in October!

This 3D platform adventure video game will take players on a fairy tale journey, putting them in control of their fan-favorite characters as the game re-imagines classic stories, such as "Little Red Riding Hood" and "The Emperor’s New Clothes". 

Out this Halloween on PlayStation, Nintendo Switch, Xbox and PC!

#HotelTransylvania #PlatformerGame #HalloweenGame

ABOUT OUTRIGHT GAMES 

We’re Outright Games, a global video games publisher working with the biggest children's franchises in the world to produce fun licensed video games! 

Founded in 2016, Outright Games has established itself as a global leader in the world of video game publishing, having delivered high quality and engaging games that feature the most beloved global family favourite franchises.  

Outright Games work with some of the biggest names in entertainment like Sony Pictures, Dreamworks, Nickelodeon and Cartoon Network to bring their stories and characters to life across titles such as Jumanji: The Video Game, Ice Age: Scrat’s Nutty Adventure, Dragons: Dawn of New Riders, Adventure Time: Pirates of the Enchiridion and Paw Patrol: On A Roll. We create games designed to delight the whole family and bring them to play together on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC. 

Outright Games has a global presence with offices in Los Angeles, London and Madrid with a global distribution network in over 25 countries. We are proud of the fact that an Outright Games title guarantees quality, a safe, family friendly experience and an adventure featuring one of the best entertainment franchises in the world. 

FOLLOW OUTRIGHT GAMES 

For the latest news, game releases and more from Outright Games, make sure to follow us using the links below! 

Outright Games on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/outrightgames/ 

Outright Games on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OutrightGames/ 

Outright Games on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Outright_Games/ 

Outright Games on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/outright_games/ 

Outright Games on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@outrightgames 

Outright Games Website: https://outrightgames.com/
